Transform Your 42 Network Learning Experience!

Say goodbye to working on projects without understanding their purpose or struggling to find the right resources. This extension enhances your 42 intranet by adding three essential features to every project page:

Built for the 42 community, by the 42 community! 

This extension thrives on contributions. Help us populate it with learning objectives, resources, and insights by contributing to our repository. Together, we can create a collaborative knowledge base to support all 42 students in their learning journey.  

Download now and be a part of the change!
